articles.title: DeepSeek Chinese AI chatbot sparks market turmoil for rivals - BBC.com
articles.description: Share prices in US and European firms fall as the Chinese technology threatens to disrupt the AI industry.
articles.content:
Peter Hoskins & Imran Rahman-JonesBusiness & technology reporters
Shares in major US technology firms have plunged after the rapid rise of a low-cost chatbot built by a Chinese artificial in… [+5016 chars]
